Class OperationStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • servlets.admin.builder.OperationStructure

  • public class OperationStructure
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsable for generating control classes for the challenge builder function.

    • Method Detail

      • createOperationStructure

        public static java.lang.String createOperationStructure(java.lang.String challengeName,
                                        java.lang.String tableName,
                                        java.lang.String[] attrib,
                                        int attribAmount,
                                        int lookUpAttrib,
                                        int vulnerability,
                                        java.lang.String propertiesFile,
                                        boolean customFilterSet,
                                        java.lang.String filterFrom,
                                        java.lang.String filterTo)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called for generating the Custom JSP servlets for custom challenges
        Parameters:
        challengeName - The custom challenge name
        tableName - The challenge's schemas's table name
        attrib - Array of attributes in schema table
        attribAmount - Amount of attributes in schema table
        lookUpAttrib - The attribute to use for lookup functions
        vulnerability - The vulnerability type to implement in generating the control class
        propertiesFile - The name of the properties file to use for connecting to vulnerable database schema
        customFilterSet - Boolean value depicting if a custom filter has been set
        filterFrom - String to be filtered
        filterTo - String to replace filtered text with
        Returns:
        The JSP content of the custom control structure.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
